bike.description: C4 carbon, integrated T-T construction w/ internal shift cable routing, shaped oversized ride tuned down tube, integrated cupped head tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: C4 carbon stays w/ shaped ride tuned chainstay, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger and post disc brake mount

components.description: RockShox Reba RLT 29" w/ 15mm thru axle and tapered alloy steerer w/ remote lockout, 100mm travel
Shimano Deore XT SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Fuji custom mountain disc 32H hubs, WTB speed disc all mountain 29 rims
WTB Prowler SL 29x2.1" cable bead folding
Tektro Auriga Pro hydraulic disc, 180/160mm rotor
Oval M650 alloy flat bar, +/- 5mm rise, 9Â° sweep, 31.8mm, 710mm wide
Oval M600 alloy reverse bolt technology, 31.8mm
